document.masterDocTitle: Aquatic Coleoptera (Dryopidae, Dytiscidae, Elmidae, Gyrinidae, Haliplidae, Helophoridae, Hydrochidae, Hydrophilidae, Noteridae, Psephenidae) of Iowa: Distributional Records and Notes

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Aquatic Coleoptera (Dryopidae, Dytiscidae, Elmidae, Gyrinidae, Haliplidae, Helophoridae, Hydrochidae, Hydrophilidae, Noteridae, Psephenidae) of Iowa: Distributional Records and Notes

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Roberts Cr. , Postville , CTH , 8/14/08; Dubuque: Little Maquoketa R ., Dubuque, CTH , 8/19/08. Distribution : Eastern USA , extending west to North Dakota in the north, Missouri , and Iowa . Habitat preferences are coarse substrate, including wood in streams and rivers.
New state record

subSubSection.paragraph:
Microcylloepus pusillus (LeConte)
.
(Downie and Arnett 1996).
Distribution: Eastern USA , extending west to Utah , Colorado
, and Wyoming .

Stenelmis bicarinata LeConte. Buchanan
:
( Wickham 1911 );
Johnson: ( Wickham 1911 ). Distribution: Eastern United States , extending west to New Mexico in the south and Minnesota in the north. Iowa , along with Minnesota , forms the northwestern margin of its range
.

R., Conesville, CTH, 8/29/12; Poweshiek: North Skunk R., Millgrove, CTH, 8/6/01; Scott: Wapsipinicon R., DeWitt, CTH, 9/16/13; Van Buren: Des Moines R., Farmington, CTH, 9/6/ 06; Wapello: Des Moines R., Ottumwa, CTH, 10/7/13; Winneshiek: Upper Iowa R., Decorah, CTH, 7/25/06. Distribution: Northeastern USA , extending southwest to New Mexico in the south and Minnesota in the north, with Iowa forming part of the western limit of its range.

Stenelmis lignicola (Schmude)
. Des Moines:
Burlington (
Schmude et al. 1992
). Distribution: Southeastern USA , with Iowa forming part of the northwestern border.

Stenelmis musgravei Sanderson. Allamakee
:
Upper Iowa R ., Dorchester , MWB, 8/24/05. Distribution : Eastern USA , extending west to Wisconsin in the north and Texas in the south. Iowa forms part of the western border of its distribution
.
